languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс протягивает руку к Винтерскейлу — температура вокруг него падает на пару градусов.{/n} "Выглядит скверно, но оперативная помощь лекаря спасет жизнь юноши. Прямо сейчас я... сделаю что смогу".

{n}Heinrix reaches a hand toward Evayne, and the temperature drops a few degrees.{/n} "He is in a bad way, but timely assistance from a chirurgeon will save his life. For now, I will... do what I can."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс протягивает руку к Винтерскейлу — температура вокруг него падает на пару градусов.{/n} "Выглядит скверно, но оперативная помощь лекаря спасет жизнь юноши. Прямо сейчас я... сделаю что смогу".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix reaches out a hand toward Evayne, and the temperature drops a few degrees.{/n} "He is in a bad way, but timely assistance from a chirurgeon will save his life. Right now, I will... do what I can."

{n}Heinrix reaches a hand toward Evayne, and the temperature drops a few degrees.{/n} "He is in a bad way, but timely assistance from a chirurgeon will save his life. For now, I will... do what I can."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix streckt eine Hand nach Evayne aus, und die Temperatur fällt um einige Grad.{/n} "Er ist in schlechter Verfassung, aber rechtzeitige Hilfe durch einen Chirurgeum wird ihm das Leben retten. Im Moment werde ich ... tun, was ich kann."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix reaches a hand toward Evayne, and the temperature drops a few degrees.{/n} "He is in a bad way, but timely assistance from a chirurgeon will save his life. For now, I will... do what I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix streckt eine Hand nach Evayne aus, und die Temperatur fällt um einige Grad.{/n} "Er ist in schlechter Verfassung, aber rechtzeitige Hilfe durch einen Chirurgeum wird ihm das Leben retten. Im Moment werde ich ... tun, was ich kann."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix tend une main vers Evayne et la température baisse de quelques degrés.{/n} « Il est mal en point, mais si nous le confions rapidement à un chirurgeon, il devrait pouvoir le sauver. En attendant, je vais... faire de mon mieux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix reaches a hand toward Evayne, and the temperature drops a few degrees.{/n} "He is in a bad way, but timely assistance from a chirurgeon will save his life. For now, I will... do what I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix tend une main vers Evayne et la température baisse de quelques degrés.{/n} « Il est mal en point, mais si nous le confions rapidement à un chirurgeon, il devrait pouvoir le sauver. En attendant, je vais... faire de mon mieux. »

languages.text: {n}海因里希向艾维尼伸出了一只手，周围的气温瞬间降了几度。{/n}“他的情况非常糟糕，但如果能即使找到医师的话，应该还能活下来。至于现在，我就……尽我所能吧。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix reaches a hand toward Evayne, and the temperature drops a few degrees.{/n} "He is in a bad way, but timely assistance from a chirurgeon will save his life. For now, I will... do what I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希向艾维尼伸出了一只手，周围的气温瞬间降了几度。{/n}“他的情况非常糟糕，但如果能即使找到医师的话，应该还能活下来。至于现在，我就……尽我所能吧。”

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスがエヴァインに手を伸ばすと、温度が数度下がる。{/n}「容体は悪いが、チラージョンが適切な処置を施せば命は助かる。とりあえず…やれることはやってみよう」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix reaches a hand toward Evayne, and the temperature drops a few degrees.{/n} "He is in a bad way, but timely assistance from a chirurgeon will save his life. For now, I will... do what I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスがエヴァインに手を伸ばすと、温度が数度下がる。{/n}「容体は悪いが、チラージョンが手を貸してくれれば命は助かる。とりあえず…やれることはやってみよう」
{n}ハインリックスがエヴァインに手を伸ばすと、温度が数度下がる。{/n}「容体は悪いが、チラージョンが適切な処置を施せば命は助かる。とりあえず…やれることはやってみよう」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix extiende su mano hacia Evayne y su temperatura desciende algunos grados.{/n} «Su estado es grave, pero una operación quirúrgica a tiempo podría salvarle la vida. Por ahora, haré lo que pueda...».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix reaches a hand toward Evayne, and the temperature drops a few degrees.{/n} "He is in a bad way, but timely assistance from a chirurgeon will save his life. For now, I will... do what I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix extiende su mano hacia Evayne y su temperatura desciende algunos grados.{/n} «Su estado es grave, pero una operación quirúrgica a tiempo podría salvarle la vida. Por ahora, haré lo que pueda...».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, elini Evayne'e doğru uzatıyor ve sıcaklık birkaç derece düşüyor.{/n} "Durumu vahim ama bir cerrahın vakitli müdahalesi, hayatını kurtaracaktır. Ben şimdilik... Elimden geleni yapacağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix reaches a hand toward Evayne, and the temperature drops a few degrees.{/n} "He is in a bad way, but timely assistance from a chirurgeon will save his life. For now, I will... do what I can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, elini Evayne'e doğru uzatıyor ve sıcaklık birkaç derece düşüyor.{/n} "Durumu vahim ama bir cerrahın vakitli müdahalesi, hayatını kurtaracaktır. Ben şimdilik... Elimden geleni yapacağım."
